    • Method Detail

      • create

        public java.lang.String create()
        Creating template "[SQL <ERROR_CODE:err_code_val> <SQL_STATE:sql_state_val> <MESSAGE:msg>]", where err_code_val - error code value, sql_state_val - SQL state value, message - SQL message. Example: 
         
 String tml = new TmlSql(100, "OK", "Okay").create();
 // This code creating template:
 // [SQL <ERROR_CODE:100> <SQL_STATE:OK> <MESSAGE:Okay>]
        Specified by:
        create in interface Template
        Returns:
        template as a String.
